projects.name: macro-analyst
projects.short: macro analyst is a currently developing project that aims to charting financial assets and building correlation studies. Built using Flask, Plotly, Pandas.

projects.name: financial-data-bulk-downloader
projects.short: CLI tool to automatically download all the required govenmental resources for macro-analyst into. The scipt will unpack and reformat accordingly.

projects.name: ocado-shopper
projects.short: Automated script that orders online groceries from ocado, using use customised name, password and grocery preferences by item id.

projects.name: pulse
projects.short: Graduation project. The app reproduces Brian Eno's interactive and generative music software Bloom. Built using Javascript, P5.js and Tone.js
